name: Boopy and Beepo - GGJ 2022
description:
A 2.5D Platformer Co-Op Game. Play as one of two unique characters with its own abilities within a fantasy world.

Encourages exploration through platforming puzzles and communication between players.

This game was created during the Global Game Jam 2022 hosted at ITU. It took approximately 48 hours to be developed and involved character design and animations, level design with assets from Polygon, networking for both local and online co-op game and all the programming topics involved.
